title.narrative: Monitoring of environment and natural resources NR

description.narrative: Monitoring of environment and natural resources project "Water Resources Irrigation Project" (WRIP) and Environmental Services Project" (ESP), co-funded by Sida and the World Bank, with a contracted expert with an estimated budget of 1,199,880 sek. In total Sida contributes with 103 (35 och 68) msek with grants and IBRD-funding amounts to 45 (40+5) mUSD (ca. 370 mSEK) and in addition there is some funding from GEF funding. The World Bank undertakes a semi-annual and annual mission per year under 2015-2016 for each of the two projects. The expert will take part in 3 missions per year which amounts to 6 missions for the period 2015 and 2016. Contracting of the expert is made with Sida's framework agreement for Agriculture Forestry and Environment where ORGUT Consulting AB is ranked first. The expert will support the Embassy with quality assurance with regard to the Albanian government execution of the of two projects (WRIP and ESP). It involves to verify that the projects are in line with the by the Swedish government adopted Results strategy for Sweden’s reform cooperation with Eastern Europe, the Western Balkans and Turkey 2014 – 2020 and with the Swedish Feminist foreign policy.

PLEASE REVIEW YOUR ANSWER AS THE QUESTION HAS BEEN CHANGED
Uppföljning av miljö och naturresursprojekt "Water Resouces Irrigation Project" (WRIP) och Environmental Services Project" (ESP) samfinansierade av Sida och Världsbanken med upphandlat expertstöd kostnadsberäknat till 1,199,880 sek. Sida bidrar totalt med 103 (35 och 68) msek i gåvomedel och IBRD lånen uppgår till 45 (40+5) mUSD (ca.370 msek) dessutom tillkommer stöd från GEF. Världsbanken genomför en halvårs och årsgenomgång under 2015-2016 för varje projekt (ESP och WRIP) och experten kommer att medverka vid några av missionerna. Experten beräknas göra tre resor om året, vilket ger totalt 6 resor för perioden 2015-2016. Kontraktering genomförs med Sidas ramavtal for Jord- och skogsbruk och miljö där ORGUT är rankad först. Expertstödet bidrar till att kvalitetssäkra den albanska regeringens genomförande av de två projekten (WRIP och ESP) och de är i överensstämmelse med "Resultatstrategi för Sveriges reformsamarbete med Östeuropa, Västra Balkan och Turkiet 2014 – 2020" samt Sveriges feministiska utrikespolitik.

participating-org.narrative: FCG Swedish Development AB (f d Orgut Consulting AB)

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: The monitoring consultant has worked as a memeber of the two mission teams for the "Water Resources and Irrigation Project", WRIP and the "Environmental Services Project", ESP. In addition to providing his input to the World Bank Aide Memoirs he has also provided Sida with separate reports highlighting issues which needed our attention. In regards to WRIP the consultant assisted the embassy in the separate dialgoue between Sida and partners in order to find ways of finalizing the project successfully. This proved very useful and the project made long awaited progress.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
